doc.title: Driven by Faith
doc.plot: Driven By Faith is a biographical story of one woman's transformation from a sinful past to a loving future through God's unfailing grace. Amelia Whikehart explains her transformation and how God never let her go, He was always there trying to keep her in His loving ways. She explains that God has made "beauty from ashes" and she is a prime example of such amazing work. Driven By Faith is an inspirational story that can appeal to all people, it shows that though we may stray further each day that our Lord and Savior is always watching over us.
